subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chase Utley slid into Ruben Tejada in a disputed play at second base, breaking Tejada’s leg, and Los Angeles rallied to defeat the Mets, 5-2, and tie the series.
snippet: Chase Utley slid into Ruben Tejada in a disputed play at second base, breaking Tejada’s leg, and Los Angeles rallied to defeat the Mets, 5-2, and tie the series.
